VideoOverlay.setPos

Function/Meaning
Specifies the top-left position of the playback rectangle
Type
Method of the VideoOverlay class
Syntax
setPos(left, top)
Arguments
left Specifies the left edge position of the rectangular area for media playback.
top Specifies the top edge position of the rectangular area for media playback.
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Specifies the top-left position of the rectangular area for media playback.
Coordinates are specified in pixels within the window's client area (the area where layers can be displayed).
